timeline.bodyText: Can you please revert any change which is just reformatting ?
timeline.author: normanmaurer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -56,23 +56,22 @@ public static void setResourceLeakDetectorFactory(ResourceLeakDetectorFactory fa
      * Returns a new instance of a {@link ResourceLeakDetector} with the given resource class.
      *
      * @param resource the resource class used to initialize the {@link ResourceLeakDetector}
-     * @param <T> the type of the resource class
+     * @param <T>      the type of the resource class

replies.bodyText: ok,i will revert any code format
replies.author: skyguard1

replies.bodyText: Sorry, forgive me for not understanding the formatting style of netty code, if there is pr in the future, I will pay attention to this

replies.bodyText: @skyguard1 don't worry... thanks for the PR :)
replies.author: normanmaurer

timeline.bodyText: What about to add a check ObjectUtil.checkPositive(samplingInterval, "samplingInterval") ?
timeline.author: amizurov

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is feasible. It is possible that this parameter is the user's configuration. Is it appropriate to make an assertion here?@normanmaurer
replies.author: skyguard1

timeline.message: Verify that the samplingInterval parameter is positive
